tags.name: ef-select
tags.description:
Expands upon the native select element,
providing a fully themeable dropdown element.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Placeholder to display when no value is set

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: Toggles the opened state of the list

properties.name: label
properties.description: Current text content of the selected value

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Placeholder to display when no value is set

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Toggles the opened state of the list

properties.name: data
properties.description: Construct the menu from data object. Cannot be used with slotted content

events.name: value-changed
events.description: Fired when the value property changes.

events.name: opened-changed
events.description: Fired when the opened property changes.
